column2: b'@sentivcapital Same here, $AMRN was my biggest loser. Could be a massive product but without IP only worth a fraction. Holding at the current valuation though. / Other small losers $SPXS "insurance", $ARPO and $BLU (all sold out)'
b'@sentivcapital @juliaskripkaser @buysidebio I was in $ARPO as well for the same reasons. @juliaskripkaser cautionary notes and management made me scale it back before results.'

b"$ARPO Cool basic science + some clinical validation, very low valuation, ignored by market -> 3 to 5x if it hit. BUT: Science new in glaucoma, pathway complicated and a massive fail in NPDR (@juliaskripkaser), weak mgmt team (@buysidebio wasn't convinced, red flag! red flag!)"
